text: Yara tomadera amangalera pratiksaya thake, tara allahara paksa theke tomadera jaya hale bale, ‘amara ki tomadera sathe chilama na’. Ara yadi kapheradera kichu bijaya haya, tabe tara bale, ‘amara ki tomadera birud'dhe prabala chilama na ebam amara ki tomaderake muminadera hata theke raksa karini[1]?’ Allaha keyamatera dina tomadera madhye bicara mimansa karabena ebam allaha kakhana'i muminadera birud'dhe kapheradera jan'ya kono patha rakhabena na
